channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My mother, 81, discovered her ‘millions’ in investments are gone. What can I do?
My friend married for a second time. Will the kids from her first marriage lose their inheritance?
item.description: “Her husband wants to be the administrator of their trust.”

item.title: My friend, 61, signed a $20K contract for dental implants. She can’t afford it. Can she fight it?
item.description: “After her room and board is paid at the assisted-living home, she has $9,000 left for the year.”

item.title: I’m about to inherit a lot of money. How do I make sure my husband doesn’t get any of it?
item.description: “We want to invest the money and play catch up with our retirement savings/funding.”

item.title: ‘I have almost no retirement savings’: I’m 57 and have $8K in my 401(k) and $17K in my IRA. Have I left it too late?
Elliott's plan for PepsiCo includes investing in some of its iconic brands, shedding others
item.description: Elliott Investment Management says PepsiCo neglected its core soda brands and is selling way too many products.

item.title: Goldman says these stocks have 'earnings power' so buy them now
item.description: Goldman Sachs analysts say they like stocks that have 'earnings power.'

item.title: Alphabet and these two other stocks are overbought with the market near all-time highs
item.description: The S&P 500 closed at a record on Thursday, as traders tied bets on risk assets to hopes for a September interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve.
